00299 inline bool
00300 DisturbanceListElement::shouldAvoid() const
00301 {
00302    return m_factor == MAX_UINT32 || m_time == MAX_UINT32;
00303 }
00304 
00305 inline uint32
00306 DisturbanceListElement::getMapID() const
00307 {
00308    return first;
00309 }

00313 {
00314    return second;
00315 }
00316 
00317 inline uint32
00318 DisturbanceListElement::floatToRaw( float factor )
00319 {
00320    // Fix-point
00321    float tempFactor = MAX_UINT16 * factor;
00322    if ( tempFactor > MAX_UINT32 ) {
00323       // Remove the connections
00324       return MAX_UINT32; 
00325    } else {
00326       return uint32(tempFactor);
00327    }
00328 }
00329 
00330 inline uint32
00331 DisturbanceListElement::infoModuleFactorToRaw( uint32 infoModuleFactor )
00332 {
00333    if ( infoModuleFactor == MAX_UINT32 ) {
00334       return MAX_UINT32;
00335    } else {
00336       return floatToRaw( float(infoModuleFactor) / float(1000) );
00337    }
00338 }
